wikimediacampaignevents-grant-id-input-l: Label for the optional [[:m:Special:MyLanguage/Grants:Administration/Eligibility|Grant ID]] field displayed on [[Special:EditEventRegistration]] and [[Special:EnableEventRegistration]]. These are special pages of the CampaignEvents extension
wikimediacampaignevents-grant-id-input-p: Placeholder for the optional Grant ID field ({{msg-mw|wikimediacampaignevents-grant-id-input-label}}) displayed on [[Special:EditEventRegistration]] and [[Special:EnableEventRegistration]]. These are special pages of the CampaignEvents extension. The numbers in this message (like: 1201-3302) represent a Grant ID and should not be translated or formatted in any way.
wikimediacampaignevents-grant-id-input-h: Help message for the optional Grant ID field ({{msg-mw|wikimediacampaignevents-grant-id-input-label}}) displayed on [[Special:EditEventRegistration]] and [[Special:EnableEventRegistration]]. These are special pages of the CampaignEvents extension. The numbers in this message represent a Grant ID and should not be translated or formatted in any way.
